title: Thank You Riot For The Mystery Gift
body:
http://i.imgur.com/G4AQIUV.jpg

I find it very Ironic how I got the last Leblanc Skin I needed since I couldn't afford to buying it due to savings for college. It was very Ironic to me because of my IGN and the fact that Leblanc is The Deceiver

Haha (:

Thank you.
